Festa Unit√†, the Litto barracks hosts a group of children: the images of the visit
The "open barracks" initiative is back
04 Nov 2019, 12:40 by Redazione



The celebration of the "Day of National Unity and Day of the Armed Forces" which was held as every year also in Avellino, saw once again the participation of the Carabinieri with a guard of honor.
The ceremony, as usual, was the occasion to consolidate the closeness between the population and the men and women of the Armed Forces.
As part of today's event, the "Open Barracks" initiative was also planned, with the opening to the public, from 8:00 am to 5:00 pm, of the Nicola Litto Barracks, headquarters of the Provincial Command of the Carabinieri of Avellino, and of the Carabinieri Companies of Ariano Irpino, Baiano, Mirabella Eclano, Montella and Sant'Angelo dei Lombardi.
Hundreds of people, welcomed by qualified personnel (who subjected themselves with patient availability to a real crossfire of questions especially for the enthusiastic curiosity of children), were introduced into the world of the Carabinieri by visiting the Operational Center, the beating heart of the Institute of Merit, as well as other rooms for daily operations.
The visit then gave way to a static exhibition of vehicles and equipment supplied to the territorial weapon, with the opportunity to board the "Gazelles" that they see daily engaged on the roads of the province to ensure safety and respect for legality.
